name: BoardTypes
sql:
CREATE TABLE [BoardTypes](
  [BoardType] INT PRIMARY KEY ASC ON CONFLICT ROLLBACK NOT NULL ON CONFLICT ROLLBACK UNIQUE ON CONFLICT ROLLBACK, 
  [Description] VARCHAR(3) NOT NULL)

name: Rankings
sql:
CREATE TABLE [Rankings](
  [BoardType] INT NOT NULL REFERENCES [BoardTypes]([BoardType]) ON DELETE CASCADE ON UPDATE CASCADE, 
  [Seconds] INT NOT NULL, 
  [Moves] INT NOT NULL, 
  [Player] VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL, 
  PRIMARY KEY([BoardType] ASC, [Seconds] ASC, [Moves] ASC))

name: Settings
sql:
CREATE TABLE [Settings](
  [ID] INT PRIMARY KEY ASC ON CONFLICT ROLLBACK NOT NULL UNIQUE, 
  [BoardType] INT NOT NULL REFERENCES [BoardTypes]([BoardType]) ON DELETE CASCADE ON UPDATE CASCADE, 
  [ShuffleMoves] INT NOT NULL)

name: DataBaseInfo
sql:
CREATE TABLE [DataBaseInfo](
  [ID] INT PRIMARY KEY ASC ON CONFLICT ROLLBACK NOT NULL UNIQUE, 
  [dbVersion] VARCHAR NOT NULL)
